sentences.sentence: The aid will not be disbursed until next year.
sentences.translation: 援助款项到明年才能拨出。

sentences.sentence: He disbursed the flowers to the pupils.
sentences.translation: 他把鲜花分发给小学生们。

sentences.sentence: Our policemen were disbursed over a wide area.
sentences.translation: 我们的警察分布在一个广阔地区。
